original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Ahaziah that he did, are they not written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
korean_text: 아하시야가 행한 그 남은 사적은 모두 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Ahaziah
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel?
